MODULE.name: Timer
MODULE.HELP_OVERVIEW: The Timer API is used to create, start, stop and check the existence of timers.
MODULE.MORE_HELP: ## Enabling the API This API is part of the `coreapi` extension that is included automatically. :::ruby extensions: ["coreapi"]
MODULE.PLATFORM: WM, CE, Android, WP8, iOS, Win32

METHOD.name: start
METHOD.DESC: Start timer with preset interval. Callback fired one time only.

RETURN.DESC: Return alive state of a timer. If callback doesn't return true, returns false.
